data.title: Submit Your Videos Below — PETER CRONE
data.text:
Submit Your Videos Below

Important: Please be sure to keep each video clip under 2 minutes.

We won’t review more than 4 videos or individual clips longer than 2 minutes.

Altogether your video submission clips should not exceed 8 minutes.

Please name your video files: first name last name video number. Ex: Peter Crone 1

Thank you!

Submit Your Main Concern: Please submit your main concern in life via video clips. This can encompass any aspect of your life; personal or professional.

Submitting Additional Videos: We’d love you to ask people in your life to also share their experience of you in your video submissions, such as parents, spouses, siblings, or anyone else relevant to your concern. They don’t need to be Freedom members or a Mastermind participant. Their perspectives and insights can provide valuable context to better understand your situation and offer tailored guidance.

Video Submission Guidelines: Please make sure that each of your video submissions is 2 minutes or less and in landscape mode. You may submit 4 videos in total. All people included in the videos submitted give full consent for the video and audio to be shared publicly (see below). We recommend these guidelines but you can submit without videos 2 or 3:

Video 1. You describing your challenges and question for Peter

Video 2. A friend or loved one on why you would make a great candidate to be coached by Peter (You can submit 2 of these videos!)

Video 3. A tour of your life
